subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte’s return to his home in Houston after breaking his fibula was short-lived, saying he was afraid he would not stay engaged with the game if he were not with the Yankees.
snippet: Andy Pettitte’s return to his home in Houston after breaking his fibula was short-lived, saying he was afraid he would not stay engaged with the game if he were not with the Yankees.
